thread.title: Joey Barton's antics unite Twitter during Burnley's shock FA Cup fifth round defeat to Lincoln City
thread.title_full: Joey Barton's antics unite Twitter during Burnley's shock FA Cup fifth round defeat to Lincoln City

author: Mark Jones
title: Joey Barton's antics unite Twitter during Burnley's shock FA Cup fifth round defeat to Lincoln City
text:
Sport Joey Barton's antics unite Twitter during Burnley's shock FA Cup fifth round defeat to Lincoln City The Burnley midfielder was up his usual tricks in the FA Cup fifth round clash at Turf Moor on Saturday, and people noticed Share Not a good look, Joey (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
When Burnley's FA Cup fifth round tie at home to non-league Lincoln City needed livening up, along came Joey Barton . 
With the Clarets being frustrated by the battling Imps from the National League, Barton weighed in to tangle with giant visiting striker Matt Rhead - first going down claiming that Rhead had elbowed him in the head and then appearing to kick out. 
Then, moments later, the midfielder picked up a booking after joining forces with Clarets defender Jon Flanagan to shove Terry Hawkridge to the ground. He's down... (Photo: Clive Brunskill) He's up again... (Photo: REUTERS) And now he's just generally causing havoc 
And not surprisingly, the incidents got plenty of people talking. 
And then when Sean Raggett headed home Lincoln's shock 89th minute winner , there was only one man people were thinking of. Joey Barton, bringing Twitter together in 2017. Like us on Facebook
